AVEVA GROUP PLC

(AVEVA)

 

Smaller related party transaction

 

 

On 11 May 2021, AVEVA entered into an agreement pursuant to which it has agreed to sell its Acquis Software, Termis Software and Water Loss Management Software businesses together (the Businesses) to Schneider Electric for an aggregate consideration of £2.6 million (the Transaction). Completion of the Transaction is expected to occur in or around July 2021.

 

For the purposes of Chapter 11 of the Listing Rules, Schneider Electric is a related party of the Company. Pursuant to Listing Rule 11.1.10R, the Transaction constitutes a smaller related party transaction and this announcement is made in accordance with Listing Rule 11.1.10R(2)(c).
